mapper.select: SELECT RANKING.RANK AS RANK, U.NAME AS NAME, RANKING.COUNT AS COUNT, U.LOGO_URL AS LOGO_URL FROM ( SELECT U.ID AS UNIVERSITY_ID, NVL(SUM(M.ZERO_WASTE_COUNT), 0) AS COUNT, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(SUM(M.ZERO_WASTE_COUNT), 0) DESC) AS RANK FROM UNIVERSITY U LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON U.ID = M.UNIVERSITY_ID GROUP BY U.ID ) RANKING JOIN UNIVERSITY U ON RANKING.UNIVERSITY_ID = U.ID ORDER BY RANKING.RANK
